pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Unlock your potential with our comprehensive quiz platform

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.question2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer2: We accept PayPal, credit cards, and local payment methods for Middle Eastern countries.
faq.answer3: Yes, all paid plans come with a 7-day free trial. No credit card required.
faq.answer4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is here to help you choose the right plan

checkout.title: Complete Your Purchase
checkout.subtitle: Secure checkout powered by industry-leading payment processors
checkout.estimatedPrice: Estimated price based on current exchange rates
checkout.paypalDescription: Pay with PayPal or credit card
checkout.processingDescription: Please wait while we redirect you to the secure payment gateway...
checkout.securityNote: Your payment information is secure and encrypted

subscription.title: Subscription Management

subscription.cancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You'll lose access to premium features at the end of your current billing period.

noSubscription.title: No Active Subscription
noSubscription.message: You don't have an active subscription. Choose a plan to unlock premium features and access to all quizzes.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Thank you for your purchase. Your subscription is now active.

step1.title: Check Your Email
step1.description: We've sent you a confirmation email with your receipt and subscription details.

step2.title: Access Premium Content
step2.description: You can now access all premium quizzes and features included in your plan.

step3.title: Start Learning
step3.description: Begin practicing with our comprehensive quiz collection tailored to your level.

meta.title: Quiz Platform - Professional Interview Preparation
meta.description: Master frontend development with 500+ curated interview questions. Practice with Angular, React, Next.js, and Redux in English and Arabic.
meta.keywords: interview, preparation, questions, angular, react, nextjs, redux, typescript, javascript, frontend, developer
